body.name: UMLo Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 25Kpa Powerful Stick Vacuum with Brushless Motor, 45mins Runtime Rechargeable Vacuum, Anti-Tangle, 6-in-1 Lightweight Vacuum Cleaners for Home Carpet Hard Floor Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 8 mins
features: 💡【Better Cleaning Results】-UMLo cordless vacuum cleaner provides 25KPa max powerful suction, lower noise, and longer service life with an upgraded brushless digital motor. This cordless stick vacuum captures debris, dust, crumbs, pet hair, pet food, cat litter, and other messes on hardwood floors and carpets

💡【Clean Home on a Single Charge】-UMLo vacuum cleaners for home comes with a detachable 2200 mAh long-lasting battery, which provides up to 45 mins runtime on eco mode, and 16 mins on Max mode. With a 1L dustbin, this rechargeable cordless vacuum cleaner can clean the whole house on a single charge. The battery is detachable and rechargeable

💡【Various Cleaning with One Hand】-With an ultra-lightweight main motor(2.4 lbs) and multiple accessories, this vacuum cleaners for home meets all your daily cleaning needs with just one hand. From cars to beds, furniture, curtains, sofas, corners, and more, this lightweight cordless vacuum is perfect for any space. Anti-tangle design keeps the cordless vacuum gathering hairs effectively without tangling and saving your precious time and effort

💡【Smart Design for Convenient Operation】 -The LED screen and 4 LED lights enhance convenience during the cleaning process. The LED lights and flexible 180° head assist in identifying and cleaning every nook and cranny, even in dimly lit areas.The clear screen displays suction levels and remaining battery power, ensuring you are always aware of the current status

💡【5-Layer Filtration System for Fresher Air】-To provide a cleaner and healthier home environment, the stick vacuum cleaner cordless is equipped with a 5-layer filtration system and multi-cone cyclone. It thoroughly filters fine dust and microorganisms, preventing them from being released back into the indoor air, and allowing you and your family to breathe fresher air. This cordless vacuum cleaner is friendly to families with pets, children, or the elderly

💡【One Click Empty & Easy Storage】-Say goodbye to dirty hands with our one-click dust cup emptying feature. The wall-mount design allows for easy storage of the vacuum cleaner and its accessories, keeping your home neat and organized. Plus, each UMLo cordless vacuum cleaner comes with a 12-month professional after-sales service, providing you with the support you need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and efficient.
reviews.reviewText: Love the light and ease of handling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cordless Vaccuum
reviews.reviewText: Love this cordless vacuum. I have 2 German Shepherds that shed like crazy and the vacuum picked up all the hair without getting clogged up or stuck around the roller. Large capacity canister so I didn't have to dump it out every few minutes. Great swivel head brush that easily moved around table legs and under furniture. I love that it has a wall mount holder that also holds the attachment so I don't have to go digging in drawers to find out where I put it when I need it. Very lightweight with a washable filter. Extension removes easily for use on stairs or under cushions. Very detailed instructions that are in English. Glad I made this purhase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not off to a good start!
reviews.reviewText: Received the S500 cordless vacuum, put it together all’s good. Plug in the charger and it won’t charge, manual said it would blink when charging. No blink! The vac has a + & - charge light so after 4hrs I checked the charge progress, on min charge. Then I tried to vacuum, worked like a charm until the small charge ran out. I sure hope it can just get the charger changed out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this amazing stick vacuum. It is lightweight,and powerful. I am a somewhat frail 75 year old woman with a largehouse and 3 long haired cats. I live in Southern Ut which is verydusty and dry. This little vac makes cleaning cat hairs, cat litter,dust and crumbs a breeze on both my hardwood floors and one 8X12 arearug. It is very easy to empty the large dust bin and clean thefilters which I recommend doing after each use. I have had manydifferent kinds of vacuum cleaners in my life, including the Dysoncordless stick vac, but this is so far the best. I have purchasedother products from this company and they have the best customerservice I have ever experienced! Don't hesitate to purchase this item. You will be very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value …and love the features!
reviews.reviewText: Bought one of these recently to replace my mom’s popular corded canister vacuum because it was essentially to heavy for her to lug around… so far, so great! She loves it and it’s light and manageable for her. I initially was leary of a unknown brand but given the price and the great job it does I’m buying another for myself. p.s. my mom is picky so that tells you it’s good :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does everything!
reviews.reviewText: It does everything! I can reach the cobwebs in my basement, cat hair on my furniture. It's perfect for hardwood stairs - it really picks up the cat hair tumbleweeds. It's amazing on hard floor surfaces. The sweeper head can reach into really small corners and around table legs. Battery life is good and recharging is easy. I highly recommend this vacuum cleaner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Economical vac does the job
reviews.reviewText: This light duty back does a great job. Battery lasts exactly 40 minutes as advertised. Perfect for the kitchen and adjacent areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this vaccum
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! I love how light weight and easy to use it is!
